item.title: 独角兽瞻博网络出售私募市场繁荣的 "锄头和铲子
item.description:
这家金融技术初创公司已筹集到 1.3 亿美元，向私人投资者提供软件。【原文：

The financial technology startup has raised $130 million offering software to private investors. 

】

item.title: WhatsApp 将首次显示广告并提供付费订阅服务
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. 将开始在其 WhatsApp 消息服务中显示广告，在公司大力投资人工智能和其他长期项目的同时，开辟了一个新的潜在收入来源。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will begin showing ads inside of its WhatsApp messaging service, opening a new potential revenue stream while the company invests heavily in artificial intelligence and other long-term projects.】

item.title: 伊朗导弹雨点般落下，以色列自诩的空中盾牌经受考验
item.description: 随着伊朗发射大量弹道导弹，以色列吹嘘的防空系统正经受着前所未有的考验。【原文：As Iran fires masses of ballistic missiles, Israel’s vaunted air defenses are being tested like never before.】

item.title: Square 将投资 2 亿欧元在葡萄牙和西班牙购置物业
item.description: 由于对办公楼和购物中心的需求增加，葡萄牙最大的房地产基金管理公司 Square Asset Management 今年计划将对西班牙和葡萄牙商业地产的投资额提高到 2 亿欧元（约合 2.31 亿美元）。【原文：Square Asset Management, the biggest Portuguese real estate fund manager, is boosting its planned investment in commercial property in Spain and Portugal this year to €200 million ($231 million) amid higher demand for office buildings and malls.】

item.title: 特朗普在美国推出自主品牌移动电话服务
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统将推出特朗普品牌的移动电话服务，该服务将依靠 "美国制造 "的无线网络和硬件。【原文：President Donald Trump is launching a Trump-branded mobile phone service, that will rely on wireless networks and hardware that is “made in America.”】

item.title: 皮克顿计划增加人工智能和技术方面的招聘，推动加拿大公司的发展
item.description: 加拿大对冲基金经理大卫-皮克顿（David Picton）说，人工智能将成为资金管理行业的一股颠覆性力量，他的公司正在寻求扩大技术能力，作为其发展计划的一部分。【原文：Canadian hedge fund manager David Picton says artificial intelligence will be a disruptive force for the money management industry, and his firm is looking to expand its technology capabilities as part of its growth plan.】

item.title: 纽约工厂活动萎缩，但前景有所改善
item.description: 由于订单和发货量萎缩，6 月份纽约州工厂活动的萎缩幅度超过预期，尽管预期有所改善。【原文：New York state factory activity shrank in June by more than projected as orders and shipments contracted, though expectations improved.】

item.title: 巴西 2025 年通胀预测在关键利率决定前下降
item.description: 就在央行行长们开会决定是否延长加息周期之前，巴西 2025 年年底通胀预期连续第三周下降。【原文：Brazil’s 2025 year-end inflation expectations dropped for third straight week, just before central bankers meet to decide whether or not to extend their cycle of interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟债务重组获债券持有人支持
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. said it won enough support from creditors to overhaul its debt as part of a plan to split the entertainment giant into two separate companies.】

item.title: 美国的盟友和对手都在躲避特朗普的关税威胁
item.description:
尽管白宫施加了压力，但领导人并没有急于达成交易。【原文：

Leaders aren’t racing to make deals despite White House pressure.

】

item.title: 阿格斯称罗马尼亚将获得 1997 年以来最大的小麦收成
item.description: 罗马尼亚下一季的小麦收成有望创下自 1997 年以来的最高纪录，从而再次跻身欧洲最大出口国之列。【原文：Romania is expected to see its largest wheat harvest in records dating back to 1997 in the next season, setting it up for another year as one of Europe’s top exporters.】

item.title: 欧佩克称配额作弊者的补偿抑制了产量增长
item.description: 欧佩克+"主要成员国上个月向市场增产的石油量低于其产量计划的头条数字，因为该卡特尔领导层推动成员国为早些时候的过量生产赎罪。【原文：Key OPEC+ nations added less oil to the market last month than the headline figure of its output plan, as the cartel’s leadership pushed members to atone for earlier over-production.】

item.title: 英国乙醇生产商在美国威胁下最后一搏
item.description: 英国一家乙醇生产商警告说，免关税的美国进口会给其业务带来风险，并表示现在挽救其产量几乎为时已晚。【原文：A UK ethanol producer that has warned of the risk to its business from tariff-free US imports said it is almost too late to save its output.】

item.title: 伊朗冲突给欧佩克+带来的回报和风险
item.description:
沙特阿拉伯及其盟国可能会利用这场危机加快提高产量，而被围困的德黑兰可能会将目标对准航道。【原文：

Saudi Arabia and allies may use the crisis to speed up more output hikes, while a besieged Tehran could target shipping lanes.

】

item.title: 伊顿同意以 16 亿美元收购国防集团 Ultra PCS
item.description: 伊顿公司同意从私募股权公司 Advent 手中收购国防和航空航天系统公司 Ultra Precision Control Systems。【原文：Eaton Corp. agreed to buy defense and aerospace systems company Ultra Precision Control Systems from private equity firm Advent.】

item.title: Roku 因与亚马逊建立电视广告合作关系而股价大涨
item.description: Roku 公司宣布与亚马逊广告公司（Amazon.com Inc.'s Amazon Ads）建立合作伙伴关系，广告商现在可以通过亚马逊 DSP 营销工具接触到 80% 以上拥有联网电视的美国家庭，之后该公司股价盘前上涨 11%。【原文：Roku Inc. shares gain 11% premarket after the company and Amazon.com Inc.’s Amazon Ads announced a partnership, saying that advertisers will now have access to more than 80% of US households with connected TV though the Amazon DSP marketing tool.】

item.title: 最常见的美国职业面临移民打击的风险
仿人机器人开发被视为未来制造业的关键
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯提供彭博社全球记者对科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Ed Ludlow 报道仿人机器人的发展及其对未来制造业的重要性。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ed Ludlow reports on the development of humanoid robots and their importance to the future of manufacturing.】

item.title: 特朗普带着有争议的关税包袱出席七国集团会议
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周一将在加拿大落基山脉与七国集团领导人进行会谈，届时最重要的议题将是伊朗和以色列之间的最新冲突及其对中东稳定和全球经济构成的威胁。【原文：When Donald Trump gets down to business with his fellow Group of Seven leaders in the Canadian Rockies on Monday, top of the agenda will be the latest conflict between Iran and Israel and the threat it poses to both Middle East stability and the global economy.】

item.title: 小小中间人如何获取科技巨头的双因素登录密码
item.description:
对全球电信系统复杂性的调查显示，通过 SMS 发送的暗码传输存在薄弱环节。【原文：

An investigation into the complexity of the global telecom system shows weaknesses in the transmission of secret codes sent via SMS.

】

item.title: 道明银行利用自动化以更少的人员交易更多的债券
item.description: 多伦多道明银行正在赢得更多的华尔街债券交易业务，而且用的人更少。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank is winning more Wall Street business trading bonds, and doing it with fewer people.】

item.title: 中国批准邦吉公司（Bunge）与维特拉公司（Viterra）的交易附带作物要求
item.description: 中国已确认批准邦吉全球有限公司（Bunge Global SA）收购竞争对手 Viterra，但周一提出了几个条件，包括继续以 "公平 "的价格向这个亚洲国家供应主要农作物。【原文：China has confirmed its approval of Bunge Global SA’s takeover of rival Viterra, but on Monday outlined several conditions, including the continued supply of key crops to the Asian nation at a “fair” price.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡恢复宽松货币政策，经济增长降温
item.description: 上一季度，斯里兰卡经济增长速度放缓，因为高基数开始追赶。【原文：The Sri Lankan economy grew at a slower pace last quarter, as a high base is beginning to catch up.】

item.title: 中东危机切断以色列天然气供应，埃及寻求燃料供应
item.description: 在席卷中东的危机导致来自以色列的天然气断流后，埃及正急于寻找替代燃料供应，以避免电力中断。【原文：Egypt is rushing to find alternative fuel supplies to avoid power blackouts after the crisis that’s engulfed the Middle East halted gas flows from Israel.】

item.title: 以色列与伊朗紧张局势加剧，巴基斯坦保持关键利率稳定
item.description: 巴基斯坦中央银行维持基准利率不变，在上个月通胀回升和以色列-伊朗冲突给经济前景增添不确定性的情况下选择了谨慎行事。【原文：Pakistan’s central bank kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged, opting for caution as inflation picked up last month and the Israel-Iran conflict added uncertainty to the economic outlook.】

item.title: 各国央行行长本周聚首，地缘政治问题迫在眉睫
item.description:
占全球经济五分之二的国家的政策制定者本周确定了利率。【原文：

Policy makers from countries accounting for two-fifths of global economy set rates this week. 

】

item.title: 爱尔兰对全球贸易风险上升发出谨慎预算信号
item.description: 爱尔兰政府部长警告说，由于全球贸易动荡预计将导致这个小型开放经济体的增长放缓，因此需要更加谨慎地管理公共财政，这预示着爱尔兰将在下一次预算编制前转变思路。【原文：Irish government ministers have warned public finances will need to be more carefully managed, signaling a shift in approach ahead of the next budget as global trade turmoil is expected to slow growth in the small, open economy.】

item.title: 扎克伯格加倍致力于人工智能，Meta 投资者欢呼雀跃
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司不断开出更大的支票，以实现其人工智能战略，而交易员们也不断为其欢呼雀跃，相信昂贵的赌注会不断得到回报。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. keeps writing bigger checks in pursuit of its artificial intelligence strategy, and traders keep cheering it on, encouraged that the expensive bets will keep paying off.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行称，高通胀情况下美股有下跌 20% 的风险
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行资本市场公司（RBC Capital Markets LLC）的策略师在一份报告中指出，如果油价上涨导致通胀飙升，那么 S&P 500 指数有可能下挫 20%。【原文：The S&P 500 Index risks sinking 20% if inflation spikes on the back of higher oil prices, according to a report by RBC Capital Markets LLC strategists that laid out three possible pullbacks.】

item.title: 冲突加剧，石油运输商暂停中东报价
item.description: 一些油轮船东和管理者评估了以色列与伊朗冲突带来的风险，因此自上周五起暂停提供前往中东航线的船只，这加剧了人们对该地区出口流量的担忧。【原文：Some oil tanker owners and managers have paused offering their vessels for Middle Eastern routes since Friday as they assess the risks from Israel’s conflict with Iran, fueling concerns over export flows from the region.】
